item.title: About me
item.description: So this is the about me page… Aka the hard part.. ;) A happily married to my wife and father of a mini me. Loves food, music, technology and thinkering, playing with stuff like 3d printer and other tools that helps me make stuff. Working as a Senior System Administrator Consultant at Redpill Linpro. My Current obsessions at work is automation and orchistration and cloud environments. All typos, bad english and opinions are my own etc, etc….
